title: Bug 43610'Shift+Alt+' gives 0x00 as key code and character
OB: Bug 43610'Shift+Alt+' gives 0x00 as key code and character Release 'Shift'OBSERVED RESULTS:DOWN: stateMask=0x0, keyCode=0x20000, character=0x0 '\0'DOWN: stateMask=0x20000 SHIFT, keyCode=0x0, character=0x0 '\0'UP: stateMask=0x30000 ALT SHIFT, keyCode=0x0, character=0x0 '\0'UP: stateMask=0x20000 SHIFT, keyCode=0x20000, character=0x0 '\0'DESIRED RESULTS:keyCode=0x10000 on the second key down.
SR: Using snippet 25 on EclipseGTKI20030924 (GNOME), do the following:1.) Press and hold 'Shift'2.) Press and release 'Alt'3.)
